title: KSail Cluster
description: A configuration object for a KSail cluster

apiVersion.description: The API version where the KSail Cluster object is defined. [default: ksail.io/v1alpha1]

kind.description: The KSail Cluster object kind. [default: Cluster]

metadata.description: The metadata of the KSail Cluster object.

name.description: The name of the KSail object. [default: ksail-default]

spec.description: The spec of the KSail Cluster object.

connection.description: The options for connecting to the KSail cluster.

kubeconfig.description: The path to the kubeconfig file. [default: ~/.kube/config]

project.description: The options for the KSail project.

configPath.description: The path to the ksail configuration file. [default: ksail.yaml]

distributionConfigPath.description: The path to the distribution configuration file. [default: kind.yaml]

kustomizationPath.description: The path to the root kustomization directory. [default: k8s]

provider.description: The provider to use for running the KSail cluster. [default: Docker]

distribution.description: The Kubernetes distribution to use. [default: Native]

deploymentTool.description: The Deployment tool to use. [default: Kubectl]

ingressController.description: The Ingress Controller to use. [default: Default]

gatewayController.description: The Gateway Controller to use. [default: Default]

secretManager.description: Whether to use a secret manager. [default: None]

editor.description: The editor to use for viewing files while debugging. [default: Nano]

mirrorRegistries.description: Whether to set up mirror registries for the project. [default: true]

deploymentTool.description: The options for the deployment tool.

flux.description: The options for the Flux deployment tool.

source.description: The source for reconciling GitOps resources.

url.description: The URL of the repository. [default: oci://ksail-registry:5000/ksail-registry]

showAllClustersInListings.description: Show clusters from all supported distributions. [default: false]

secretManager.description: The options for the Secret Manager.

sops.description: The options for the SOPS secret manager.

publicKey.description: Public key used for encryption. [default: null]

showAllKeysInListings.description: Show all keys in the listed keys. [default: false]

showPrivateKeysInListings.description: Show private keys in the listed keys. [default: false]

localRegistry.description: The local registry for storing deployment artifacts.

name.description: The name of the registry. [default: ksail-registry]

hostPort.description: The host port of the registry (if applicable). [default: 5555]

mirrorRegistries.description: The mirror registries to create for the KSail cluster. [default: registry.k8s.io-proxy, docker.io-proxy, ghcr.io-proxy, gcr.io-proxy, mcr.microsoft.com-proxy, quay.io-proxy]

proxy.description: A proxy for the registry to use to proxy and cache images.

url.description: The URL of the upstream registry to proxy and cache images from. [default: https://registry-1.docker.io]

name.description: The name of the registry. [default: ksail-registry]

hostPort.description: The host port of the registry (if applicable). [default: 5555]

validation.description: Options for validating the KSail cluster.

validateOnUp.description: Validate the project files and configuration before creating a new cluster. [default: true]

reconcileOnUp.description: Wait for reconciliation to succeed on a new cluster. [default: true]

validateOnUpdate.description: Validate the project files and configuration before applying changes to an existing cluster. [default: true]

reconcileOnUpdate.description: Wait for reconciliation to succeed on an existing cluster. [default: true]

verbose.description: Verbose output for validation or status checks. [default: false]
